text: grandpa had more organic matter than you do all tillage tools to destroy soil structure all tillage tools decrease water infiltration all tillage tools reduce organic matter and all tillage tools increase weeds 27 000 gallons of water with one percent organic matter and six inches of soil that's a fourth of an inch of water if we can increase the organic matter by four percent we've put an extra inch in the top six inches an extra two inches on top foot grandpa had more organic matter than you do
